column1: Local Foods////Sandwiches come with two sides and I usually get the housemade chips and the quinoa. I've tried the soba noodles and beets as well and both are great. I usually get a fountain drink when I go but now they've started service wine by the glass and a small selection of craft beer (Real Ale
column3: St. Arnold) which has my full attention. For the tea-totalers there is a refreshing Mintade for $3.
